rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports culling and outbreak numbers factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports negative facts/action taken (cull, outbreak) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes action to be taken ('will cull 40,000 laying hens') without active reassurance.
